CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been transcribed accurately in this data.

u.a: INV explains 4 boxes to MOT then leaves the room
MOT is visible from the waist down
CHI turns to look in direction of the table
MOT walks across room to get a box then sits down on the floor with the box in front of her
CHI walks behind MOT following her
MOT takes box off of table
MOT positions CHI next to her on the floor facing the camera
<aft> CHI grabs box pulling it up on his lap
CHI takes book out of box
MOT moves box off to side
CHI turns toward MOT and then climbs up on her lap
<$=1> MOT positions CHI on her lap
CHI is on MOT lap facing the camera
MOT leans over CHI shoulder while she holds the book in front of them
CHI points to something using both hands
background noise on tape makes transcription of this segment difficult
MOT leans back with CHI in her lap then leans forward again
MOT moves around with CHI to get more comfortable
CHI points to page and continues to do so through MOT's next two utterances
CHI lifts his hand to his cheek while looking down at the book
MOT taps picture of cup on the page
CHI turns page back to previous page
CHI points to something on the page
MOT looks at picture in book
MOT looks up toward camera then down at book
CHI continues to point to page
CHI continues to look at book
MOT points to the next page and continues to do so during CHI's next utterance
MOT reaches over CHI shoulder and points
MOT slides her finger across the pages
MOT points to something else on the same page
MOT begins to point to another picture
CHI leans closer to the book
CHI points to and looks closely at page
MOT points to picture on one page
CHI points to and looks at picture on opposite page
MOT flips quickly to back cover and then back to facing page
<bef> CHI looks at page . CHI points to picture
MOT looks at CHI and puts the book off to the side
CHI gets up from MOT lap . CHI runs across the room
CHI is out of camera range
CHI takes a box off the table
MOT reaches for box as CHI walks with it
CHI walks to middle of floor . CHI kneels down on the floor with the box
MOT is out of camera range
<bef> CHI removes puppets from the box
CHI back is to the camera
MOT pats rug in front of her
<$=1> MOT turns CHI around so he is facing the camera
CHI now sits on the floor next to MOT facing the camera
MOT reaches for puppet on the other side of CHI
CHI looks down while holding the other puppet in his hand
CHI puts the puppet on his hand
CHI looks over at MOT puppet
MOT holds her puppet up in front of her
CHI holds his puppet up in front of MOT
CHI moves his free hand to his puppets mouth to move it
MOT reaches for CHI puppet with her own
CHI devours MOT's puppet with his puppet
MOT reaches for CHI puppet with her own
CHI hits MOT puppet with his puppet
MOT holds her puppet in front of her
CHI holds his puppet down by his side
MOT refers to puppet while she plays
MOT moves her puppet closer to CHI puppet
CHI swats at MOT puppet with his puppet
CHI hits MOT puppet with his puppet
MOT makes her version of a monster sound
MOT moves her puppet towards CHI
CHI waves puppet around then it falls off of his hand
CHI reaches for puppet then puts it back on his hand
MOT holds puppet up in front of her
CHI pulls the puppet up on his arm
CHI swats at MOT puppet then grabs it between both his hands pulling on it
MOT wrestles her puppet with CHI puppet
MOT reaches for CHI with her puppet then tickles him
CHI reaches for MOT puppet then takes it off her hand
MOT reaches for box to her side
CHI takes puppet off his hand and reaches for other half of the box for the puppets
MOT closes up the box and moves it off to the side
CHI gets up then walks across the room
CHI reaches for another box on the table then is out of camera range momentarily
MOT gets up and puts the book box on the table
CHI walks back into camera range with a box . CHI kneels down on the floor and begins to open the box
MOT and CHI face each other on the floor with the box between them
CHI moves box around trying to open it
MOT holds onto part of the box to assist CHI . CHI opens box
<aft> CHI reaches for and grabs a fistful of crayons . CHI removes a piece of paper from the box
CHI looks down at crayons and paper then chooses some crayons putting the others off to the side
MOT closes box and puts some paper on top
MOT reaches for paper beside CHI
MOT places paper on box top
<bef> CHI looks at crayons beside the box . CHI kneels in front of the box looking down
CHI reaches to his side and puts more crayons down
MOT shifts position of the box and picks up a crayon
CHI leans over box and begins to color
MOT leans back and watches with one hand holding down the paper
CHI leans back then gives the drawing to MOT
MOT points to paper on box top
CHI slides piece of paper out from underneath MOT finger
CHI looks down at box and paper
CHI looks down while holding a crayon
<aft> MOT puts a piece of paper on the box
CHI leans forward over the box
CHI makes large scribbles on paper
MOT is holding some crayons in her hand
CHI takes crayons from MOT's hand
CHI moves crayons from hand to hand then drops one . CHI picks up the crayon then begins to color
CHI bangs crayon on paper then picks up another one and bangs the paper with that crayon
CHI looks around on the floor
<aft> CHI picks up a crayon and bangs crayon on paper
CHI continues to bang on paper
CHI bangs crayon repeatedly on paper
CHI looks around on the floor for something
CHI looks up at MOT then makes a poking gesture with the crayon towards MOT face
MOT leans back away from CHI poking the crayon and shakes her head
CHI looks down then looks up at MOT
CHI bangs crayon twice on the paper stops and bangs on paper again
CHI picks up and puts down a number of crayons after banging them individually on top of the box
CHI reaches for crayon off to the side then grabs one
MOT reaches down by her side then places one hand over some of the crayons
CHI continues to bang crayon on top of the box
CHI picks up and puts down a number of crayons after banging each one on the box
<aft> CHI looks at MOT then back at paper
CHI settles on one color then colors with it
CHI looks up at MOT then back down at his drawing while continuing to color
CHI reaches behind him to get another crayon
<2-3> MOT points to table with boxes on it
MOT reaches for the paper then moves it away
CHI gathers crayons in front of him
MOT picks up box with paper on top
CHI looks across room to table with boxes on it
MOT gathers up paper and crayons
CHI head is only visible as he reaches for a box
MOT is out of camera range but refers to the box the drawing came in
MOT gets up placing the box with drawing on table
only MOT midsection is visible and CHI from the waist up
MOT picks up box then walks back then sits on the floor with it in front of her
CHI kneels down then reaches into the box
MOT slides the house out of the box
CHI refers to the toy house with its two sections
CHI kneels down next to MOT helping to pull the house out of the box
MOT helps CHI open the house then moves box out of the way
CHI stands over the house looking inside
CHI kneels down then reaches for something inside the house
MOT leans back watching CHI play
CHI moves toys around in front of the house
CHI reaches for something as he sits down in front of the house
CHI takes object out of house
CHI reaches into house then plays with stuff on the floor in front of the house
CHI reaches for something in the house
CHI leans back then looks in the house
CHI reaches for something then places it in the house
CHI reaches for then picks up one of the toy people
<3 .> CHI looks over his shoulder at MOT
MOT is sitting off to the side in partial view of the camera watching CHI play
CHI plays with objects in house
MOT leans forward and looks into the house
CHI looks around while holding the car in place
<$=1> MOT leans back and watches CHI
CHI pushes toy car around on the floor
CHI pushes car back towards toy house
CHI drives toy car into the house
CHI leans forward looking into the house
CHI holds the car with one hand inside the house while looking over to the back side of the house
CHI leans back to the front of the house looking inside
CHI puts one hand into each open end of the barn
MOT leans forward closer to CHI
<bef> CHI looks up while playing with car
CHI bends down reaching into house then removes car from inside
CHI pushes car back into garage
CHI looks around on the floor then picks something up
CHI leans back looking around then reaches for more toys
<$=1> CHI looks around at toys in front of him
CHI picks something up off the floor then bangs it twice on the floor in front of him
<bef> CHI reaches for toy in front of him . CHI holds toy up in front of himself then looks at it
CHI leans forward towards the house
CHI plays with stuff in the house
CHI plays with objects in front of house
CHI leans back while looking down
CHI looks down then reaches for something to the side
MOT reaches across then removes a couple of toy people from the house
CHI leans forward closer to the house
MOT plays with toy people moving them closer to house
CHI looks over at what MOT is doing
MOT holds toy on the floor next to CHI
MOT moves toy around on the floor
<$=1> CHI passes a toy bed to MOT
<$=1> MOT places toy person on the bed
CHI reaches over MOT hand for something
CHI gesture is interrupted by MOT activity
MOT lifts toy from the bed
MOT takes toy person off of the bed . MOT moves toy closer to herself
CHI moves toy person towards MOT toy person
MOT moves her toy closer to CHI
CHI looks up in the direction of the house
MOT leans closer to CHI . MOT looks at CHI
CHI reaches for then picks up something
MOT places her toy in a toy chair next to her
CHI looks over at MOT toy while placing his toy in the chair
CHI places his toy facing MOT toy on the floor
MOT moves her toy a bit closer to CHI toy
MOT pushes her toy into the house
CHI leans forward to place his toy in the house
MOT fidgets with a toy person on the floor in front of her
<aft> CHI leans back while looking inside the house
MOT leans forward while reaching into the house
CHI reaches into the house then leans back to look around
MOT reaches for something in front of CHI
MOT moves the house closer to them
MOT reaches into the house to put something in
MOT points to one section of the house
CHI reaches to place something in the house
MOT brings a toy to the table
<$=1> CHI looks down at house in front of him
CHI looks briefly around inside of house
CHI leans forward reaching into the house
<bef> CHI leans back while looking down
CHI plays with something in front of him
MOT reaches over to touch CHI ear
MOT is off to the side mostly out of camera range but her arm comes in to full view as she touches CHI
CHI puts down what he was playing with
CHI looks to the side briefly in the direction of MOT
MOT fidgets with toy person on the floor in front of her
CHI picks something up in front of him
CHI leans forward as he reaches into the house
both the CHI and the backside of the toy house are facing the camera so some of CHI complete actions and gestures are blocked from view by the house
CHI leans back while holding a toy in his hand
CHI plays with something in front of him
CHI plays with something in front of him
MOT leans forward then touches CHI leg
MOT leans forward while reaching into the house
MOT places something in front of CHI on the floor
CHI plays with something in front of him
CHI turns toward MOT while leaning one arm on her knee
CHI turns back in the direction of the toys looking down
MOT picks up a toy person to play with
CHI moves something in front of him
CHI complete action is blocked by the toy house
MOT leans back away from CHI and toys
CHI leans forward reaching for something
CHI plays with one toy then picks up another
CHI bangs two toy people together then lets one sail across the room
CHI looks in direction of toy then turns to look at MOT
CHI gets up then runs across room
after CHI gets up he runs out of camera range momentarily
CHI bends down to pick up toy he threw then runs back to kneel down in front of the house
CHI looks up at MOT while holding toys in his hand
<aft> CHI throws toys in the house
CHI looks up at MOT then in the direction of the house
MOT is mostly out of camera range but seems to be referring to toys CHI is playing with
CHI plays with something on the floor in front of him
CHI actions are blocked by the house
CHI reaches for something in the house
MOT reaches across CHI . MOT picks up a toy holding it up in front of CHI
CHI takes toy from MOT hand
CHI puts MOT toy in toy car
